Trustee_1_pre_2.name: Hiroshi Tanaka
Trustee_1_pre_2.content: My reputation as a trustee remains very good due to my effective execution of the proposed allocation plan and success in delivering expected outcomes to the investor. I have showcased my reliability and competence by managing resources effectively, resulting in a profit distribution that aligns with our initial agreement. This successful transaction not only enhances my credibility but also positions me favorably for future investment opportunities.
